languages.text: {n}С трудом вам удается восстановить в голове фрагменты безобразного кутежа. Почему-то особенно отчетливо вы помните заискивающие лица стражей, уговаривающих вас перестать, вопли нищих, которым вы раздавали до неприличия огромную милостыню, и топот сервитора, на спине которого вы скакали по станции под веселый хохот Джай.{/n}

{n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С трудом вам удается восстановить в голове фрагменты безобразного кутежа. Почему-то особенно отчетливо вы помните заискивающие лица стражей, уговаривающих вас перестать, вопли нищих, которым вы раздавали до неприличия огромную милостыню, и топот сервитора, на спине которого вы скакали по станции под веселый хохот Джай.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscenely amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

{n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscenely amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

{n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscenely amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你努力拼凑着昨晚狂欢的记忆。不知为何，你能清楚地回忆起各种各样的细节，包括那些守卫劝你别再胡闹时卑躬屈膝的讨好眼神，当你给乞丐数量惊人的施舍时他们的尖叫声，以及你骑着机仆绕着星站到处乱跑时，婕伊毫不掩饰的快乐。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你努力拼凑着昨晚狂欢的记忆。不知为何，你能清楚地回忆起各种各样的细节，包括那些守卫劝你别再胡闹时卑躬屈膝的讨好眼神，当你给乞丐数量惊人的施舍时他们的尖叫声，以及你骑着奴工绕着星站到处乱跑时，婕伊毫不掩饰的快乐。{/n}

languages.text: {n} 昨夜の酒宴の断片的な記憶をつなぎ合わせるのに苦労する。なぜか、はっきりと思い出せるのは、あなたを説得してやめさせようとした警備員たちの恩着せがましい目つきと、あなたが法外な額の施しを与えた物乞いたちの叫び声、そしてジェイの隠しきれない歓声のために、ステーションの周辺を走り回ったサーヴィターの足踏みの音だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n} 昨夜の酒宴の断片的な記憶をつなぎ合わせるのに苦労する。なぜか、はっきりと思い出せるのは、あなたを説得してやめさせようとした警備員たちの恩着せがましい目つきと、あなたが法外な額の施しを与えた物乞いたちの叫び声、そしてジェイの隠しきれない歓声のために、ステーションの周辺を走り回ったサーヴィターの足踏みの音だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas reconstruir la juerga de anoche a partir de retazos de memoria. Por alguna razón, puedes recordar las miradas suplicantes de los guardias que intentaban convencerte de que pararas, los gritos de los mendigos a los que diste una limosna obscenamente cuantiosa y los pisotones del servidor sobre el que cabalgaste por toda la estación para alegría de Jae.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas reconstruir la juerga de anoche a partir de retazos de memoria. Por alguna razón, puedes recordar las miradas suplicantes de los guardias que intentaban convencerte de que pararas, los gritos de los mendigos a los que diste una limosna obscenamente cuantiosa y los pisotones del servidor sobre el que cabalgaste por toda la estación para alegría de Jae.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tentez avec difficulté de rapiécer les quelques souvenirs qu'il vous reste des agapes d'hier soir. Pour une raison obscure, vous vous rappelez clairement les regards obséquieux des gardes cherchant à vous persuader de vous arrêter, les hurlements des mendiants que vous avez noyés sous les aumônes, et les pas lourds du servitor que vous avez chevauché dans toute la station sous les éclats de rire de Jae.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tentez avec difficulté de rapiécer les quelques souvenirs qu'il vous reste des agapes d'hier soir. Pour une raison obscure, vous vous rappelez clairement les regards obséquieux des gardes cherchant à vous persuader de vous arrêter, les hurlements des mendiants que vous avez noyés sous les aumônes, et les pas lourds du servitor que vous avez chevauché dans toute la station sous les éclats de rire de Jae.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst deine bruchstückhaften Erinnerungen an letzte Nacht wieder zusammenzupuzzeln. Aus irgendeinem Grund erinnerst du dich deutlich an die schmeichlerischen Blicke der Wächter, als sie versuchten euch anzuhalten, auch an die Freudenschreie von Bettlern, denen ihr eine obszöne Menge an Almosen geschenkt habt, und an das Gestampfe des Servitors, auf dessen Rücken ihr zu Jaes unverhüllter Freude durch die Station geritten seid.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst deine bruchstückhaften Erinnerungen an letzte Nacht wieder zusammenzupuzzeln. Aus irgendeinem Grund erinnerst du dich deutlich an die schmeichlerischen Blicke der Wächter, als sie versuchten euch anzuhalten, auch an die Freudenschreie von Bettlern, denen ihr eine obszöne Menge an Almosen geschenkt habt, und an das Gestampfe des Servitors, auf dessen Rücken ihr zu Jaes unverhüllter Freude durch die Station geritten seid.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dün geceki âleme dair bölük pörçük hatıralarını bir araya getirmekte zorlanıyorsun. Nedense muhafızların seni durman için ikna etmeye çalışırkenki yaltakçı bakışlarını, absürt miktarlarda sadaka verdiğin dilencilerin çığlıklarını ve üstüne binip istasyonda gezdiğin hizmetörün tepinişlerinin Jae'ı kahkahalara boğuşunu net bir şekilde hatırlıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You struggle to piece together your fragmented memories of last night's carousing. For some reason, you can clearly recall the ingratiating looks of the wardens as they tried to persuade you to stop, the cries of the beggars to whom you gave an obscene amount of alms, and the stamping of the servitor that you rode around the station to Jae's unconcealed glee.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dün geceki âleme dair parça parça hatıralarını bir araya getirmekte zorlanıyorsun. Nedense muhafızların seni durman için ikna etmeye çalışırkenki yaltakçı bakışlarını, absürt miktarlarda sadaka verdiğin dilencilerin çığlıklarını ve istasyonda bindiğin hizmetörü bir yerlere vurduğunda Jae'ı müthiş neşelendirdiğini net bir şekilde hatırlıyorsun.{/n}
